languages.text: {n}Винтерскейл вздрагивает, как от удара плетью, и тени сомнения омрачают его взгляд.{/n} "Испытываешь границы дозволенного, {name}? Мне нравится твоя храбрость, но не стоит так глубоко совать голову в пасть ко льву".

traits.locale_text: {n}Винтерскейл вздрагивает, как от удара плетью, и тени сомнения омрачают его взгляд.{/n} "Испытваешь границы дозволенного, {name}? Мне нравится твоя храбрость, но не стоит так глубоко совать голову в пасть ко льву".

languages.text: {n}Winterscale flinches as if from a blow, and doubt darkens his gaze.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the beast's throat."
languages.original_text: {n}Винтерскейл вздрагивает, как от удара плетью, и тени сомнения омрачают его взгляд.{/n} "Испытываешь границы дозволенного, {name}? Мне нравится твоя храбрость, но не стоит так глубоко совать голову в пасть ко льву".

traits.locale_text: {n}Shuddering as if from a whip lash, Winterscale's gaze is darkened by the shadows of doubt.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the lion's throat."

{n}Shuddering as if from a whip lash, Winterscale's gaze is darkened by the shadows of doubt.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the lion's throat."

{n}Shuddering as if from a whiplash, Winterscale's gaze is darkened by the shadows of doubt.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the lion's throat."

{n}Shuddering as if from a whiplash, Winterscale's gaze is darkened by the shadows of doubt.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the lion's throat."

{n}Winterscale flinches as if from a blow, and doubt darkens his gaze.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the beast's throat."

{n}Winterscale flinches as if from a blow, and doubt darkens his gaze.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the beast's throat."

languages.text: {n}Winterscale se estremece como si hubiese recibido un latigazo, y la sombra de una duda oscurece su semblante.{/n} «Tanteando los límites, ¿eh, {name}? Aplaudo su osadía, pero no debería introducir la cabeza hasta la garganta de la bestia».
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale flinches as if from a blow, and doubt darkens his gaze.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the beast's throat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale se estremece como si hubiese recibido un latigazo, y la sombra de una duda oscurece su semblante.{/n} «Tanteando los límites, ¿eh, {name}? Aplaudo su osadía, pero no debería introducir tanto la cabeza en las fauces del león».

languages.text: {n}温特斯凯尔皱着眉头，像是被人揍了一样。他的目光充满了怀疑，黯淡下来。{/n}“你是在试探我的底线，对不对，{name}？我欣赏你的胆量，但你不该把头伸到恶兽的嘴里。”
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale flinches as if from a blow, and doubt darkens his gaze.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the beast's throat."

traits.locale_text: {n}温特斯凯尔颤抖了一下，仿佛挨了一鞭子一样。他的目光充满了怀疑，黯淡下来。{/n}“你是在试探我的底线，对不对，{name}？我欣赏你的胆量，但你不该把头伸到狮子嘴里。”

languages.text: {n}Winterscale frémit comme si on venait de le frapper et son regard s'emplit de doute.{/n} « On teste les limites, {name} ? J'aime votre cran, mais il est imprudent de mettre la tête si loin dans la gueule du lion. »
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale flinches as if from a blow, and doubt darkens his gaze.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the beast's throat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterscale frémit comme si on venait de le frapper et son regard s'emplit de doute.{/n} « On teste les limites, {name} ? J'aime votre cran, mais il est imprudent de mettre la tête si loin dans la gueule du lion. »

languages.text: {n}ウィンタースケールは殴られたかのようにひるみ、その眼差しが疑いの影で暗くなる。{/n}「限界を探っているのか、{name}？その大胆さは気に入ったが、獣の喉に頭を突っ込むのは止めた方がいいぞ」
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale flinches as if from a blow, and doubt darkens his gaze.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the beast's throat."

traits.locale_text: {n}すばやく震えるウィンタースケールの視線は、疑いの影で暗くなる。{/n}「限界を探っているのか、{name}？その大胆さは気に入ったが、ライオンの喉に頭を突っ込むのは止めた方がいいぞ」

languages.text: {n}Winterzunder zuckt wie unter einem Hieb zusammen und ein Hauch von Zweifel verdunkelt seine Miene.{/n} "Wir loten wohl die Grenzen aus, was, {name}? Eure Kühnheit gefällt mir, aber Ihr solltet Euren Kopf nicht so weit in den Schlund der Bestie stecken."
languages.original_text: {n}Winterscale flinches as if from a blow, and doubt darkens his gaze.{/n} "Testing the boundaries, are we, {name}? I like your boldness, but you shouldn't stick your head so far into the beast's throat."

traits.locale_text: {n}Winterzunder zuckt zusammen wie von einem Peitschenschlag. Sein Blick wird vom Schatten des Zweifels getrübt.{/n} "Wir loten wohl die Grenzen aus, was, {name}? Eure Kühnheit gefällt mir, doch Ihr solltet Euren Kopf nicht gar so weit in den Rachen des Löwen stecken."
